name: bmtmix
title: Bookmarks Tags Mix
description: Shows toolbar buttons with dropdowns which shows bookmarks that have a custom combination of tags.
author: Ruben <Ruben@e-motiv.net> (attic.e-motiv.net)

preferences.name: xTags
preferences.title: x Tags configuration (easier via button)
preferences.description: Define your tags to show on toolbar here. Format like this: {label: "Label 1", tags: ["tag1", "tag2"]},{label: "Label 2",tags: ["tag2"]}
